titleStmt.title: An examination of Dr. Balyes five waies whereby he endeavours to prove the Church of Rome to be the only church of Christ wherein salvation is to be had, and the Church of England to be no true church. By Robert Seppens rector of Hingham in Norfolk.
titleStmt.author: Seppens, Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by M[ary]. C[larke]. for William Oliver, bookseller, in the market-place in Norwich,

notesStmt.note: Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1641-1700 reel 2413 has leaf A4 torn away.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
